mutants.original_line: min_indices = [i for i, val in enumerate(lst) if val == min_val]
mutants.mutated_line: min_indices = [i for (i, val) in enumerate(lst) if val != min_val]

mutants.original_line: max_indices = [i for i, val in enumerate(lst) if val == max_val]
mutants.mutated_line: max_indices = [i for (i, val) in enumerate(lst) if val != max_val]
